description.zh_Hans: 一位以悲观主义和意志哲学为核心的哲学指南，擅长探讨人生意义与道德基础。
description.zh_Hant: 一位以悲觀主義和意志哲學爲核心的哲學指南，擅長探討人生意義與道德基礎。
description.en: A philosophy guide inspired by pessimism and the philosophy of will, skilled in exploring the meaning of life and the basis of morality.
